story.title: My Creative Journey
story.content:
I've always been drawn to how design shapes the way we feel. What started as a hobby—creating flyers for friends' events and helping small businesses with their social media—grew into a passion for turning ideas into visuals that resonate.

I believe great design doesn't require the most expensive tools. It requires intention, a keen eye, and a commitment to understanding what makes your audience stop scrolling. Whether it's a church flyer that fills seats or an Instagram post that drives clicks, I craft each piece with purpose.

philosophy.title: My Philosophy
philosophy.content: Design should feel human. It should connect, inspire, and move people to action—without feeling cold or corporate. I bring a creative, approachable energy to every project, blending professionalism with the warmth that makes brands memorable.
